subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Bryant lacrosse coach Mike Pressler will coach the United States men’s lacrosse team in the 2010 world championship in England. Pressler, who is his third season at Bryant, led Duke to 10 N.C.A.A. tournaments but was forced to resign after rape allegations were leveled against three players. State prosecutors later determined that the accusations were false.
